investos.portfolio_optimization.cost_model package

Submodules

investos.portfolio_optimization.cost_model.base_cost module

class investos.portfolio_optimization.cost_model.base_cost.BaseCost

Bases: object

Base cost model for InvestOS. Other cost models should subclass BaseCost. The only requirement of custom cost models is that they (re)implement value_expr().

value_expr(t: datetime, h_plus: Series, u: Series) → Series

Method that calculates per-period costs given period t holdings and trades.

Parameters:

  • t (datetime.datetime) – The datetime for associated trades u and holdings plus trades h_plus.

  • h_plus (pandas.Series) – Holdings at beginning of period t, plus trades for period t (u). Same as u + h for t.

  • u (pandas.Series) – Trades (as values) for period t.

investos.portfolio_optimization.cost_model.holding_cost module

class investos.portfolio_optimization.cost_model.holding_cost.HoldingCost

Bases: BaseCost

Calculates cost for holding short positions, given customizable short_rate.

value_expr(t: datetime, h_plus: Series, u: Series) → Series

Method that calculates per-period (short position) holding costs given period t holdings and trades.

Parameters:

  • t (datetime.datetime) – The datetime for associated trades u and holdings plus trades h_plus.

  • h_plus (pandas.Series) – Holdings at beginning of period t, plus trades for period t (u). Same as u + h for t.

  • u (pandas.Series) – Trades (as values) for period t.

investos.portfolio_optimization.cost_model.trading_cost module

class investos.portfolio_optimization.cost_model.trading_cost.TradingCost

Bases: BaseCost

Calculates per period cost for trades u, based on spread, standard deviation, volume, and price.

sensitivity_coeff

For scaling transaction cost; 1 assumes 1 day’s volume moves price by 1 std_dev in vol

Type:

float

value_expr(t: datetime, h_plus: Series, u: Series) → Series

Method that calculates t period cost for trades u.

Trading cost (per asset) is assumed to be half of bid-ask spread, plus (per asset) standard deviation * % of period volume traded. Assumption is trading 100% of period volume moves price by 1 (default value for self.sensitivity_coeff) standard deviation.

Parameters:

  • t (datetime.datetime) – The datetime for associated trades u and holdings plus trades h_plus.

  • h_plus (pandas.Series) – Holdings at beginning of period t, plus trades for period t (u). Same as u + h for t.

  • u (pandas.Series) – Trades (as values) for period t.
